Posts.EditableText:
I am looking for beta-testers for an IF game I hope to enter in IFcomp 2011, and will be ready in a couple of days.
[quote:35423evz]The Myothian Falcon

"That day, the 9th of June, 3145, started out like any other, perhaps a little hotter than usual. Then Maisy DeValle entered Vic's office."

Vic Gantry, P.I., has a new client. She's wanted for the murder of her husband, Lawrence, one of the most wealthy men in New Chicago, and she wants Vic to prove her innocence.[/quote:35423evz]
This will be a good opportunity to raise awareness of Quest 5 in the wider IF community, but it is only going to give a good impression if it has been properly tested, so if you are interested PM me, or e-mail the_pix at hotmail dot com.
Posts.HTML:
I am looking for beta-testers for an IF game I hope to enter in IFcomp 2011, and will be ready in a couple of days.

The Myothian Falcon

"That day, the 9th of June, 3145, started out like any other, perhaps a little hotter than usual. Then Maisy DeValle entered Vic's office."

Vic Gantry, P.I., has a new client. She's wanted for the murder of her husband, Lawrence, one of the most wealthy men in New Chicago, and she wants Vic to prove her innocence.


This will be a good opportunity to raise awareness of Quest 5 in the wider IF community, but it is only going to give a good impression if it has been properly tested, so if you are interested PM me, or e-mail the_pix at hotmail dot com.

Posts.EditableText: As far as I can tell this game isn't available in the list of games on textadventures.co.uk, is there a reason you haven't tried to publicise it? Also possible is I just somehow failed to find it, as there isn't any sort of search functionality for the games database. So instead I had to download the all-games zip from the competition (there's also a "play online" link on the competition web site, but the web player doesn't currently let you save games, which is a bit of an issue).
